To clarify , test produce information would involve diagnostic finding participant . We measure eye movement range visual condition , include saccade , fixation , smooth pursuit , scan path optico-kinetic nystagmus After receive proper introduction sign proper consent form , subject receive instruction carry cognitive assessment answer verbal questionnaire . The subject also undergo eye track . In order validate data collect eye-trackers , may ask subject complete non-invasive vision assessment breathalyzer assessment . We also refuse disclose result breathalyzer assessment subject since data collect research purpose . Subjects ' eye movement track binocularly fix distance computer monitor brief time period .
